name: Hilltopulator
description:
Hilltopulator is a procedural generator of hilltop castles.

Please leave your thoughts and feedback. What direction do you think the project should take? Also, please be kind. This is just a prototype. For Best Results, use a PC browser (not mobile).

ActionCommandGenerate New CastleClick "Hilltopulate" Button

Full Screen
Button on Lower Right

Hide CastleUnchecking "Show Castle" will hide the castle from view and show the original terrainHide OceanUnchecking "Show Ocean" will hide the ocean plane, making the terrain look like a hilltop in a flat desertOrbit
Mouse Hold Right ClickZoomMouse Wheel
